Name: Received
Description: A scanned record has been received

Name: Attached to case
Description: The scanned record has been attached to existing case

Name: Case created
Description: A new case is created from scanned record

Name: Rejected
Description: The scanned record has been rejected

Name: Manually handled
Description: The scanned record has been handled byCW manually

Name: Journey Reclassified
Description: The exception record has been successfully reclassified
